description.message: Gestúry myšou! Rýchla a jednoduchá navigácia po internetových stráknach za použitia myši a klávesnice.

options_addgesture_title.description: explanation of what you are doing (adding a gesture to a specific action) ($ACTION$ is replaced automatically by the action name, such as: History Back--so insert it untranslated in the appropriate place in the translation)

options_button_addgesture.description: button to add the new gesture to the action

options_button_overwrite.description: button to overwrite the gesture made to the new action

options_button_startaddgesture.description: Label for a button to start setting up a new gesture

options_button_tryagain.description: button to reject the gesture made and try to make a new one

options_contents_more.description: category type for all external links

options_contents_settings.description: category type for all settings links

options_contents_status.description: link to open the status page

options_mousebutton_1.description: name for the 'middle' mouse button (To replace $BUTTON$ variables below)

options_note_print_button.description: Label on the button to print the page

popup_button_hidepageaction.description: a button to hide the pageaction

popup_button_options.description: a button to go to the options page

popup_status_blocked_file2_link.description: text naming the link that goes to chrome://extensions/

setting_button_export.description: button to save settings as a backup file

setting_group_hide.description: button to hide a group of settings

setting_group_show.description: button to show a group of settings
